### Generated file! Edit the templates in src/templates then re-run ./make-cmake.py

set(SOURCES spherical_volume_invariant.cpp)

set(HEADERS spherical_volume_invariant.h)

#set(RESOURCES meshlab.qrc)

add_library(filter_spherical_volume_invariant MODULE ${SOURCES} ${HEADERS} ${RESOURCES})

target_include_directories(filter_spherical_volume_invariant PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
target_link_libraries(filter_spherical_volume_invariant PUBLIC common)

set_property(TARGET filter_spherical_volume_invariant PROPERTY FOLDER Plugins)

set_property(TARGET filter_spherical_volume_invariant PROPERTY RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY
                                           ${MESHLAB_PLUGIN_OUTPUT_DIR})

set_property(TARGET filter_spherical_volume_invariant PROPERTY LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY
                                           ${MESHLAB_PLUGIN_OUTPUT_DIR})

install(TARGETS filter_spherical_volume_invariant DESTINATION ${MESHLAB_PLUGIN_INSTALL_DIR}
                COMPONENT Plugins)
